title: [Large-Scale] Political Ideology Critique and Practical Strategies for Higher Education and Workplace-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Higher Education and Workplace-Based Learning, with Practical Experience in Professional Settings
context.additional_context: Advanced Course for Practitioners: Critically Analyzing Structural Issues in Educational/Workplace Settings Through Political Ideology Analysis and Exploring Alternative Practices. Strengthening Policy-Research-Practice Integration Based on Linguistic Domain Expertise

learning_goals: Learners can analyze workplace-based educational policies and practical cases by applying critical methodology of political ideology

Learners can propose alternatives addressing the four core challenges in higher education and vocational fields (corporate governance reform, inclusive workplace environments, technology investment, and balancing labor rights)
Learners can design strategies for supporting marginalized groups and promoting well-being from a lifelong learning perspective

resources: Domestic and International Higher Education & Workforce Policy Case Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
